mydata <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_orders_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
items <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_order_items_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
product <- read.csv("./olist_data/product_category_name_translation.csv", header = TRUE)
payment <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_order_payments_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
customer <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_customers_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
geo <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_geolocation_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
review <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_order_reviews_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
order <- mydata
seller <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_sellers_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
product <- read.csv("./olist_data/olist_products_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
prod_trans <- read.csv("./olist_data/product_category_name_translation.csv", header = TRUE)
order_pay <- merge(order,payment,by="order_id")
order_product <- merge(order_pay,items,by="order_id")
length(unique(order$order_id))
length(unique(order$customer_id))
status <- order %>% group_by(order_status) %>% summarize(count=n()) %>% arrange(desc(count))
status
max(order_pay$payment_value)
min(order_pay$payment_value)
mean(order_pay$payment_value)
median(order_pay$payment_value)
value <- order_product %>% select(order_id, price, freight_value) %>% group_by(order_id) %>% arrange(desc(price,freight_value))
head(value)
